post.text: At the debate, the impeccably dressed Ken Bone asked a great question about meeting our energy needs. Hillary's response:

comment.author: Brandon
comment.text: She is courageous to stand up to the onslaught of ridiculous conspiracy theories and other deceptive and misleading characterizations of her career. I have been a fan since she mentioned decades ago that she did not want to stay home and bake cookies.

replies.author: Brandon
replies.text: Joseph Peppers thanks for the laugh.

replies.author: Emma
replies.text: Wake up... it's the truth regarding Hillary . Trust me I wish it wasn't true but it is.

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: So hillory became a corrupt politician.
